akas: Battalion Aid Station Israel (English title) (informal literal English title)
akas from release info: Battalion Aid Station Israel (English title) (informal literal English title)

1.title: Pilot: Part 1
1.plot: The story of the medical team of the 33rd paratroopers platoon. The medics get into an emergency incident and treat an injured soldier in the field. Rotem, A new paramedic, arrives to the platoon.

2.title: Pilot: Part 2
2.plot: Dekel and Mekarer are still in conflict and he prevents him from entering the dining room. The medics are called to a scene of a terror attack and Rotem experiences a mass-casualty incident for the first time. Alex gets into trouble after an inquiry about Amir's case. Rotem and Daniel are getting closer.

3.title: Putin's Brother
3.plot: Lia gets drunk and sentenced to a trial. The relationship between Rotem and Daniel is heating up. After Alex is expelled from the platoon, another doctor arrives and imposes a new order in the medical team.

4.title: Missing Supplies
4.plot: The medics look for a solution to the missing drugs issue. During a visit to the recon unit, Rotem and Eitan are getting closer, and new details about the private life of Avri are revealed. Meanwhile at the brigade, Osher tells Polchak news that will influence his future.

5.title: Little Red Riding Hood
5.plot: After being attacked at the clinic, Daniel is determined to find out what the recon unit is trying to keep quiet. Polchak is helpless about Osher's pregnancy and tries to convince her to get an abortion. Ben-Lulu has a lead as to who's responsible for the broken vials, and the medics decide to investigate the issue in their own ways.

6.title: It Will Be Okay
6.plot: Daniel is looking for information about what's going on in the recon unit. Ben-Lulu exploring ways to get closer to Amira and the medics are determined to get blood samples from the recon unit. Daniel fights with Avri and Rotem recalls an event from her past.

7.title: Gauze Strip
7.plot: The medics are called to treat another incident, the brigade is worried by the consequences of Eitan's actions. Meanwhile at the platoon, Ronna, Lia and Shirli are having fun during guard duty. Daniel has an idea on how to discover additional information regarding Amir's case.

8.title: Sleepless Night
8.plot: Ronna is enjoying the sudden fame following the photo, while Shirli needs to confront her father. A guest surprises Rotem by coming the platoon and Eitan helps her. Ben-Lulu needs to protect his lamb from Agam and Mekarer.

9.title: Git Head
9.plot: Polchak needs money for Osher's tests and Daniel needs money for testing Amir's bandages. Ben-Lulu has an idea to get the amount of money. Rotem returns home to treat Roie and the medics staying in the base run into an unexpected patient.

10.title: Fathers and Sons
10.plot: The medics are helpless after Balata's lost fight. Daniel returns home and decides to visit Alex. Rotem is dealing with Roie. Polchak and Daniel bring the money to Leonid. Lia finds out new information about Orian and Eitan, Rotem and Roie meet at the same bar in the evening.

11.title: Monkey
11.plot: Rotem and Eitan arrive with Roie to the hospital, that's where they meet Daniel and Polchak. Rotem and Daniel clash. Leonid finds out what's in the bandages. The medics try to convince Alex to come back to the platoon with them.

12.title: Calimero
12.plot: Daniel, Polchak and Ben-Lulu find about the mess they got into with the military police. Rotem and Eitan are together. The recon unit go out on a trek, and the medics go to visit Balata hoping it'll help them.

13.title: A Stain Not Coming Off
13.plot: Daniel tells Lia about the drugs issue. The armorer, Benny, goes mad from the smell of grease in his hands and looks for a solution from Avri, the doctor. Polchak is worried about Osher and the baby.

14.title: Bandages
14.plot: Ben-Lulu finds a new warrior for the cages. Partuk is angry with Daniel and nervous to know what is the deal with the bandages. Zehavi's foot condition is getting worse. Dekel can't get time alone with Shirli, and the military police officer comes to visit Daniel at the platoon.

15.title: Annulment of Vows
15.plot: Daniel is investigated by the military police. Rotem gets a night off and shares her personal story with Lia. Zehavi confronts Eitan and Schneider about the stimulants. Ronna tells Shkedi about Rotem and Daniel's relationship. Ben-Lulu is seeking out a way to annul Polchak's vow.

16.title: What's Wrong with Dyslexics
16.plot: Ben-Lulu and Daniel try to convince Shafiq to give them another shot in the cages. When that fails, Ben-Lulu strikes a deal with Amira. In the meantime Lia comes for Orian's rescue. Dekel and Tetro are ordered to treat the recon unit's soldiers, and Partuk is excited about leaving the platoon.

17.title: Jewish Dragon
17.plot: Ben-Lulu seeking out ways to get a passport. Avri can't reach an understanding with his wife Orit. Osher undermines Polchak's confidence, and Ben-Lulu encounters an unpleasant situation with the Bedouins.

18.title: Reality Bites
18.plot: Polchak is happy about the victory. Schneider offers Orit a tempting proposal. Ben-Lulu is disturbed after the night with the Bedouins. Ronna strikes a deal with Mekarer in exchange for a meal made from Ben-Lulu's lamb, while developing a plot with Eitan at the same time.

19.title: Amira
19.plot: The medics treat and evacuate the injured lady. Chushchash comes back to the clinic after feeling bad. Shkedi involves Chushchash in the shady plan and Zehavi is refuses to do a surgery in his leg. Ben-Lulu and Amira get closer. Partuk is still feeling down and keeps looking for answers about the bandages.

20.title: Obsession
20.plot: Ben-Lulu tries to convince Polchak to lose a fight but Polchak is blinded by the fame. Mantzur gets revenged and Orian is the prime suspect. The recon unit go on a military exercise and Shirli tells Daniel that Partuk isn't going to the Officers School.

21.title: Emergency Exit
21.plot: Zehavi realizes that the recon unit are taking stimulants. Polchak agrees to lose a fight to raise money for the drugs and for Osher's abortion. Orian is bummed that Lia doesn't share and introduce her to the medics. Ben-Lulu is debating whether or not to give Tarzan to Mekarer in return for Amira's passport.

22.title: Beelzebub
22.plot: The medics realize that because of Polchak's victory they are going to jail. Rotem has to get money for Roie's rehab institute, and turns to Shirli for help. The observer girls get injured in their eyes, Lia and Orian use that to get some time together.

23.title: What Are We Talking About
23.plot: Polchak bakes a cake and goes to propose Osher to marry him. Lia convinces Mekarer to not kill Tarzan. Daniel is pressured in the detention room.

24.title: Bride & Groom
24.plot: Rotem still needs the money for Roie's rehab institute and turns to Avri for help. Partuk becomes the platoon's chief medic. Rotem and Ronna confront. The medics are called to treat a car accident.

25.title: In Her World
25.plot: Rotem tries to convince Daniel to try to find the substances. Tetro looks for Dekel who's gone missing after the accident, while he continues to get tangled with Nissim. The band "HaTikva 6" perform at the platoon.

26.title: Mufasa
26.plot: Avri talks to Reut and tries to convince her to not give up on him. Nissim continues looking for Orly. Polchak is determined to find the substances so that the charges filed against him will be dropped. Shafiq is worried about Chushchash's condition.

27.title: Shirli
27.plot: Avri moves to Partuk's room after his room burned down. Daniel and Rotem continue looking for the substances. Avri can't function, and Dekel who's gone missing comes back to ask for Rotem and Daniel's help.

28.title: Through Walls
28.plot: Ben-Lulu's song is gaining traction and gets broadcast on the radio. Tetro is nervous that Nissim is going to find him, Daniel tries to call Alex back without any success, and decides to visit him at his house.

29.title: What Doesn't Kill Me
29.plot: Yedidya is putting pressure on Rotem, Daniel meets Tania, Alex's sister. Partuk is called to the recon unit to treat Yarden who's gone mad. Eitan accompanies Ronna to her campaign photoshoot and Rotem joins Daniel for a meal at his house.

30.title: Side Effects
30.plot: Shafiq's with Chushchash at the hospital and his condition is worsening. Schneider goes to the recon unit to treat Yarden. Shafiq arrives and confronts Schneider. Lia comes to visit Orian at the platoon.

31.title: Snake's Slough
31.plot: Yedidya asks Schneider for more money. The Bedouins bring back Chushchash from the hospital and ask the medics for their help. Yedidya tries to take Chushchash back but is stopped by the Bedouins. A snake in the showers causes a riot at the platoon.

32.title: Until When
32.plot: Ben-Lulu interviews on the radio. There's tension between Rotem and Daniel after the breakup. The medics plan to smuggle Chushchash.

33.title: Hanged on the Cross
33.plot: The medics go on the planned rousting to help Chushchash. Avri tries to get back with Orit, and Tetro meets a girl through Tinder.

34.title: Waiting
34.plot: The tension between Orian and Lia continues. Tetro smuggles Nicole to the platoon so that she could stay with him. The relations between Schneider and Avri are undermined. Ben-Lulu is looking for ways to be the ambulance driver again and the medics are called to treat an accident.

35.title: Body Language
35.plot: Dana tells the girls that Partuk is going to the officers school. Polchak is anxious for money because of his father. Shirli tells Daniel that there's something weird with Partuk's requests. Tetro wants to go to Nicole.

36.title: White Night, Part 1 of 3
36.plot: Zehavi's pain is getting worse so Avri and Ronna take him to the doctor. The recon unit go on a military exercise. Ben-Lulu has a date with Agam.

37.title: White Night, Part 2 of 3
37.plot: The medics are chasing Tetro and the money. The recon unit complete the military exercise. Zehavi feels deceived after the meeting with the orthopedist.

38.title: White Night, Part 3 of 3
38.plot: Ben-Lulu decides to fight his fears, Tetro thanks Dekel and Lia confronts Rotem. Zehavi realizes who's behind the recon unit's stimulants.

39.title: Let's Talk About Rotem
39.plot: Daniel is put on trial in front of the platoon commander after the fight with Eitan. Lia bursts out in the clinic. Daniel's mother is worried about him and tries to get in touch with him through Zehavi.

imdb.plot outline: Welcome to Battalion Aid Station 33, the most desirable place in the base. Two precast structures for sleeping, a joint shower, infirmary, vending machine and lots of hormones. This is the home of eight male and female medics who care for the paratrooper battalion located in the middle of the desert. Every medic wants to get there, every soldier wants a female medic to tend to him and, if you are neither, seven minutes in an air-conditioned room is something no one will refuse. Everyone need the BAS medics, making them feel a bit above the others. Beyond the prestige and benefits, the medics bear a great deal of responsibility - they must maintain the battalion's health, ensure ongoing medical care and treat the casualties in the event of battle. The soldiers' lives depend on the medics' real time performance. Each character at the battalion arrives from a different world. Their social status, education, background and dreams are so diverse, but in the army it's all for one and one for all. The BAS is a family. A family that is about to be put to a test. The BAS' calm is shattered in the first episode, when a mysterious training accident reveals a soldier who loses touch with reality and goes on a shooting rampage. Dr. Alex, concerned by the incident, decides to perform blood tests on the unit's soldiers despite objections from commanders in the field. The BAS medics, headed by Daniel, insist on investigating the matter and only get into trouble.
imdb.title: Combat Medics
plot: A series taking place in an army medical center located in a remote military base and following the bizarre characters and occurrences in the center.

Welcome to Battalion Aid Station 33, the most desirable place in the base. Two precast structures for sleeping, a joint shower, infirmary, vending machine and lots of hormones. This is the home of eight male and female medics who care for the paratrooper battalion located in the middle of the desert. Every medic wants to get there, every soldier wants a female medic to tend to him and, if you are neither, seven minutes in an air-conditioned room is something no one will refuse. Everyone need the BAS medics, making them feel a bit above the others. Beyond the prestige and benefits, the medics bear a great deal of responsibility - they must maintain the battalion's health, ensure ongoing medical care and treat the casualties in the event of battle. The soldiers' lives depend on the medics' real time performance. Each character at the battalion arrives from a different world. Their social status, education, background and dreams are so diverse, but in the army it's all for one and one for all. The BAS is a family. A family that is about to be put to a test. The BAS' calm is shattered in the first episode, when a mysterious training accident reveals a soldier who loses touch with reality and goes on a shooting rampage. Dr. Alex, concerned by the incident, decides to perform blood tests on the unit's soldiers despite objections from commanders in the field. The BAS medics, headed by Daniel, insist on investigating the matter and only get into trouble.::Nadav
